ingredients: 1   +   1/2 cups white sugar, 12 ounces candied mixed fruit, 1 cup milk,   +   3/4 cup butter, 5 ounces glace cherries, roughly chopped, 2 ounces candied mixed citrus peel, 2 ounces chopped walnuts, 1 teaspoon ground allspice,   +   1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 12 ounces sifted self-rising flour, 2 large eggs
